data.title: Financial Aid Application Assistance
data.text:
Before scheduling your FAFSA (https://studentaid.gov/) appointment please have the following ready:

FSA ID (Please try logging into your account at: https://studentaid.gov/fsa-id/sign-in/landing to ensure your password works or click the link to create an FSA for you and/or one of your parents)

Access to student and parent email account

You and your parent(s) social security number (if applicable for parent)

Your Alien Registration Number (if applicable)

Your parent(s) date of birth

Parent(s) month and year they were married/divorced/separated/widowed

A copy of you and your parents Federal Tax Returns

2020 W-2s

Records of untaxed income, if applicable

FAFSA Workshops

In-person Workshops are available weekly.

Join us for a workshop to complete your Free Application for Federal Student Aid! We can help you complete the application step-by-step either virtually or in-person. If you just need to pop in to ask a quick question we can also answer your general questions as well! Register for one of our sessions below:

Join an In-person FAFSA Workshop
